\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index::doc}}


These are the (internal) guidelines for the EPFL\sphinxhyphen{}UNIL CROSS project
\sphinxstyleemphasis{Digitizing the Dualism Debate}. They contain our project pipeline,
instructions for installation and usage of several programs,
as well as indications for the analyses of the texts.
